products.title: iPhone 14 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 14 Pro is the latest flagship smartphone from Apple, featuring a stunning 6.1-inch OLED display, A16 Bionic chip, 128GB storage, and a triple-lens camera system. This phone also includes advanced features such as Face ID, wireless charging, and water resistance.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy A54
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy A54 is a mid-range smartphone with a 6.5-inch FHD+ Super AMOLED display, 4GB of RAM, 128GB of storage, and a quad-lens camera system. It also features a 5000mAh battery with fast charging capabilities and runs on Android 11 with One UI 3.1.
